Imagine Minnions talking and you can translate anything in their language!
Give it a go!

body.raw:
Like so many others, I just wanted a place to collect some projects I worked on. Maybe I'll add a blog, maybe I won't. I'm not sure yet.

If you like the design, check out the Repository on GitHub.

Based on [Chronark Design](https://chronark.com/)

document.title: Currency Converter
document.description: Convert Currency with easy and style. Always Up To date.

body.raw:
## Overview
**Currency Converter** is a currency coverted website OFC, where you can do that in a single click.


### Description
This currency converter app provides a seamless and accurate way to exchange currencies in real time. Designed with simplicity in mind, the app fetches up-to-date exchange rates and allows users to quickly convert amounts across multiple currencies. The interface is intuitive, ensuring a smooth experience whether for travel budgeting, investment planning, or simply staying informed about currency values.

**Background:**
The app features a vibrant, globally-inspired background that subtly reflects the flow of international commerce. Smooth gradients and gentle animations offer a modern look while enhancing the app's usability, making it a practical and visually appealing tool for anyone needing reliable currency conversions.

document.title: MegaBlog
document.description: Blog with ease! No filteration BE FREE!

body.raw:
## Overview
**MegaBlog** is a blogging website! who would've guessed. The catch is, there is no filteration write whatever you want and on whoever you want.


### Description
In todays fast-paced digital world, bloggers and content creators face challenges in managing and scaling their platforms due to the complexity of integrating various technologies for design, security, and content management. Existing solutions often lack customization, flexibility, or scalability, making it difficult for creators to deliver dynamic and responsive user experiences without extensive technical expertise. Additionally, ensuring secure data handling, seamless user authentication, and a rich content editing experience remains a pain point.

The Megablog app addresses these issues by offering a modern, integrated solution that combines the power of React, Tailwind CSS, Appwrite, Redux, Redux Toolkit, TinyMCE, and Vite. This allows for a highly customizable, scalable, and secure platform, enabling content creators to focus on delivering rich content without worrying about the underlying technical complexities.

body.raw:
## Overview
**Password Generator** is a react based webapp that i made while learning basics, like how to handle context API etc.


### Description

This password generator app provides a quick and secure way to create strong passwords. Built with a focus on user customization, the app allows users to select password length and include special characters for enhanced security. With each generation, the app provides unique, randomized passwords to suit various needs.

**Background:** The app features a dynamic, customizable background that can change based on user preferences. Its clean design and subtle animations make it both a practical tool for security and a visually engaging experience, perfect for users looking for strong password **need numbers? symbols? fix length? All covered!** solutions.

document.title: React Router Practice App
document.description: Just a basic routing app, purpose was to learn react-router.

body.raw:
## Overview
Practiced react-router-dom.

### Description
Made with the help of [Hitesh Sir](https://www.youtube.com/@HiteshCodeLab)

document.title: The TODO App V1
document.description: This project is a React-based frontend, with local host.

body.raw:
# <center>Welcome to The TODO App</center>

## Features

- **Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) Todos**: Full management of your todo tasks.
- **Rainbow Theme**: Switches between wierd colors, even i don't know why i added that.
- **Responsive Design**: A user-friendly interface that adapts to different screen sizes, ensuring a great experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

document.title: The TODO App V2
document.description: Updated version of TodoV1, just with some tinkerin in front end.

body.raw:
# <center>Welcome to The TODO App</center>

## Features

- **Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) Todos**: Full management of your todo tasks.
- **Rainbow Theme**: Switches between wierd colors, even i don't know why i added that.
- **Responsive Design**: A user-friendly interface that adapts to different screen sizes, ensuring a great experience on both desktop and mobile devices.

document.title: Birthday Surprise
document.description: Atmos clone to surprise my brother in his bday!

body.raw: ### Overview A 3D plane which takes you to your dream place! HOLD TIGHT and enjoy! ### Description **Pic** I just cloned [Wawa Sensei](https://www.youtube.com/@WawaSensei) repo and tinkered it to make it a birthday website! Cheers to Wawa Sensei to make such amazing clone of real one [Atmos](https://atmos.leeroy.ca/)
